Title: Beg
Writer: Aleksandr Alov, Mikhail A. Bulgakov (books), Vladimir Naumov
Actors: Lyudmila Saveleva, Aleksey Batalov, Mikhail Ulyanov, Tatyana Tkach
Plot: The defeat of the "White Army" in the Russian Civil War of 1918-21, causing massive emigration of the upper classes and nobility, called "White Russians". Set in Crimea, Constantinopol and ...
